sra_ids.title: SRA Sample IDs
sra_ids.description: Comma-separated list of SRA accession IDs (e.g., SRR1039508,SRR1039509,SRR1039512)

fasta.title: Reference Genome (FASTA)
fasta.description: Nucleotide sequence of the reference genome used for alignment

gtf.title: Reference Genome (GTF)
gtf.description: Gene annotations for the reference genome in GTF format

sjdb_overhang.title: STAR - sjdbOverhang
sjdb_overhang.description: Length of genomic sequence around annotated junction for splice junction database (typically read_length - 1)

genome_sa_index_nbases.title: STAR - genomeSAindexNbases
genome_sa_index_nbases.description: Length of SA pre-indexing string (typically 10-15, scales with genome size)

ncpu.title: Number of CPUs
ncpu.description: Number of CPUs to use for SRA download and STAR alignment tasks

memory_gb.title: Memory (GB)
memory_gb.description: Amount of RAM to use for STAR alignment tasks

max_reads.title: Maximum Reads (Optional)
max_reads.description: Optional maximum number of reads to download from SRA (for testing/downsampling). Leave blank to download all reads.

workflow_failure_mode.title: Workflow Failure Mode
workflow_failure_mode.description: Behavior when individual tasks encounter failures
